Posts.Content: Hiya,not that I can be a help at all at the moment, but I was diagnosed on the 15th and am in for a scan on the 27th with results from this on the 29th. I have been told that I will need Chemo, I will need surgery and I will need radio therapy. The order of which will be decided on 29th. I follow your post with interest as I have not yet been through the process, and it will give me some insight.hope you don't mind?
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in 11 days.....

Posts.Content: Have a fantastic party, I was due to be starting my first round on the 3rd November, but it has been delayed due to an infection, so fingers crossed it goes ahead on the 10th Nov, and this time next year all will be much improved:-) and my kids can have a huge hallow'een party.
Posts.Title: Raising a glass to everyone going through treatment

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies, although i have lots of very supportive friends, talking to people that have gone through and are going through, is fantastic. I suppose i'm sort of in denial at the moment. Thank you again. I will prob be on here  alot in the next few months.
Posts.Title: New to this!

Posts.Content: Hiya, all, thanks for your lovely replies , I am going in today for my CT scan, and am extremely nervous. Didn't sleep last night , had horrible dreams!  Just gotta get through today ( and two more sleepless night ) before results day on Friday. Everything is crossed x x
Posts.Title: New to this!

Posts.Content: Hiya, All i know so far is that i'm having complete clearance of lymph nodes in on arm and something else done to my boob, He did say not to rule out masectomy! :-( I go for a ct scan next wednesday with the results on the friday!
Posts.Title: New to this!

Posts.Content: Hi all, I was just diagnosed on the 15th Aug, currently awaiting CT scan, been tols i will need chemo , i will need surgery! Still feel numb and cannot absorb any info that i was given. Just feel like i'm in limbo.
Posts.Title: New to this!

Posts.Content: Hiya Lovely friends, Just an update on progress following my ct scan. The cancer is contained to one side affecting the boob and the Lymph nodes, It is not hormone affected. I am in on the 10th for Pre op and going in on the 18th for surgery, Lumpectomy and Auxillery node clearance. Once that has started to heal i will be starting 18weeks of Chemo, followed by Radiotherapy then a course of a drug called Herceptin. All this is still very confusing and i suppose i will have more questions for the consultant after surgery. Bit nervous,but i 'll get there.
Posts.Title: New to this!

Posts.Content: Thankyou, Dreamthief. That is one of my favorite sayings x x
Posts.Title: New to this!
